items.name: Master Ball
items.text: Automatically catch the next Pokemon encountered.

items.name: Great Ball
items.text: Add +4 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Poke Ball
items.text: Add +2 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Red Card
items.text: Subtract -1 from any opponents next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Red Flute
items.text: Subtract -3 from any opponents next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Potion
items.text: Heal +5 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Max Potion
items.text: Heal +10 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Soda Water
items.text: Heal +8 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Revive
items.text: Revive one KO'ed Pokemon to half HP (Rounded Up).

items.name: Max Revive
items.text: Revive one KO'ed Pokemon to full HP.

items.name: Gold Nugget
items.text: Sell for $300.

items.name: Star Piece
items.text: Sell for $350

items.name: Scarf Band
items.text: Increase the Max HP of your active Pokemon by 3.

items.name: Leftovers
items.text: At the end of your turn, heal your active Pokemon by 1 HP.

items.name: Boxing Gloves
items.text: Increase the damage of your active Pokemon attacks by +1.

items.name: Winners Debt
items.text: The next trainer battle you win, your opponent must give you an extra $200.

items.name: Looker Ticket
items.text: Challenge any trainer to a battle instead of having your turn.

items.name: Ultra Ball
items.text: Add +6 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Acro Bike
items.text: Your movement die is now a d8 going forward.

items.name: Flat Tire
items.text: Choose an opponent. Their next movement die is a d4.

items.name: HM02: Fly
items.text: Fly to Safron City.

items.name: Weakness Policy
items.text: Your active pokemon has no weakness.

items.name: Trainer Repel
items.text: Ignore the next Battle spot you or an opponent lands on.

items.name: Pokemon Fan Club
items.text: Encounter a Wild Pokemon instead of having your turn.

items.name: Team Rocket's Plan
items.text: If your opponent would land on a WildPokemon spot, instead treat it as a Battle spot.

items.name: Lost Vacuum
items.text: If your opponent would land on an Item spot, instead give that item to yourself.

items.name: Double Team
items.text: You have advantage on your next movement roll.

items.name: Bill's Helping Hand
items.text: During your next GYM battle, subtract -2 damage from a GYM Leaders active pokemon's attacks.

items.name: Pokemon Doll
items.text: If you would be chosen for another trainers Battle partner, instead reroll the die one time.

items.name: Pokemon Incense
items.text: Choose a Pokemon Type. Your next WildPokemon roll will be of that type.

items.name: Golden Hammer
items.text: Choose an opponent. Their active pokemon drops any item held in their hands.

items.name: Heavy Ball
items.text: Add +5 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon with a speed value in the negatives.

items.name: Quick Ball
items.text: Add +4 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon with a speed value greater than 3.

items.name: Bright Powder
items.text: Subtract -3 to your opponents initiative die on their next battle.

items.name: Lucky Specs
items.text: Add +3 to your next initiative die roll.

items.name: Black Sludge
items.text: During your next GYM battle, you go first instead of the GYM Leader.
